title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Learning Strategy Design Through Analysis of Remote Education Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can specifically describe at least three major difficulties in remote education environments (e.g., decreased motivation, lack of learning space, stress).
Learners can propose at least two customized learning strategies suitable for their learning environment based on survey results.
Learners can systematically compare peers' remote learning experiences and derive improvement strategies using qualitative analysis techniques.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
